about_the_game:
Gordy and her punk band, Dead Pets, have been playing together for… a while, and have never made it big. Heading into their 30s, their personal responsibilities and the band's uncertain future is looming over them. Do they have what it takes to give Dead Pets one last shot at success?





Dead Pets Unleashed is a feminist, management-lite, minigame-heavy, slice-of-life, narrative game; about music, friendship, and maturing. Playing as Gordy, you’ll go to band practice, manage Gordy’s finances and wellbeing, as well find time to earn enough money to cover... well, everything.

Decide where Gordy’s priorities lie to shape the future of the Dead Pets band. With different endings, Gordy will have the chance to grow up in different ways, depending on the choices you make.





Long-term friendships can be messy, especially when everyone grows up at their own pace. The effect a job, romance, or changing lifestyle has can impact the whole band.

On top of everything else, the band's first taste of success comes at the cost of Gordy’s mental health and physical wellbeing. Gordy struggles with what it means to be a victim, and how to move forward.





From the creators of Welcome to Elk, dive into the demon world of New Void City, and give your childhood dreams one last chance.

It’s time to get loud, grow up, and rock out.





Narrative slice of life, minigames, and a management system.

You play as Gordy, the protagonist of Dead Pets Unleashed. Get to know the characters through conversations and travel around New Void City, visiting places like her favorite record store, the best dive bar in the city, her parent's house, and going to band practice.

We change up the gameplay with minigames! Such as diner dash minigame when you're at work, making a hotdog after work, a rhythm game for when you're at band practice.

Gordy is pretty irresponsible when it comes to money. You’ll need to keep track of her finances, as well as Gordy's wellbeing, the band's power, and her social points through choices in the game.





  • Killer Soundtrack: Dead Pets Unleashed features a punk rock EP performed during the game.
  • Minigames for Days: Including working a shift at a diner (diner dash), rhythm games, and making hot dogs.
  • A Demon City filled with Life: New Void City is filled with NPCs to befriend, with their own storylines.
  • Success is in Your Hands: There will be multiple endings - with the success of the band determined by your choices throughout the game.
  • Cartoonish Inspirations: For fans of Bojack Horseman and Tuca and Bertie. We were inspired by their colorful, surreal worlds, long-term and complicated adult friends, and zany, offbeat humor.
  • Manage Your Choices: Every choice affects Gordy's wellbeing, the band's power, her social points, or costs money.

content_descriptors.notes:
Content Warning: Dead Pets Unleashed will contain a major storyline relating to sexual assault and harassment. 

There is an implied sexual assault that occurs towards the end of Episode 2 of the demo. There is a content warning in-game before the scene takes place, and you'll have the choice to skip over the specific scene if you choose.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Dead Pets Unleashed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Dead Pets Unleashed is probably a top-five Gamescom game for me”
Matt Gardner, Forbes

“IGN's personal favourite from the Dames 4 Games showcase was the unabashedly feminist Dead Pets Unleashed”
Ryan Dinsale, IGN

“It’s a lot of story, a lot of heart, and fantastic mechanics to match that make this game hard to put down once you’ve picked it up.”
Marielle Bokor, Third Coast Review
short_description: Struggling punk rock band, Dead Pets, are looking for their big break. Play rhythm games at band practice, work a diner shift, converse with characters and manage Gordy’s life. Dead Pets Unleashed is a feminist, slice-of-life, management-lite, minigame-heavy story; unleash your inner demon!
